phrases: Jupiter centric, Pisces, B type with a wood aspect.
It is all clear to me now!
Moriyama is a hopeless romantic who always walks her own path!
She is a dreamer, but escaping reality in a good way!
It is all clear to me now!
Izumo is an idealist who interacts equally with everyone!
Though she is good at adapting to her environment,
she takes her ideals seriously and often complains about reality.
Fortune-telling from your star sign, your blood type, and the Four Pillars of Destiny.
I have got it all in my head.
Why do not you use your head for useful studies instead?
Oh come on, I know you are interested.
Izumo is really hard to get to.
Nope, I cannot do it for guys.
I can only tell the fortune of girls!
It is not the same to do it for guys.
I am telling you that it will not work!
I wonder how Satan's son was born...
We should organize a surprise birthday party for Kamiki!
Why do we have to celebrate her birthday?
Bon, we decided by majority rule, so do not complain!
Then let us decide on everyone is duties!
What do you do at a birthday party?
There should be presents... and a cake.
We should prepare snacks and drinks too.
I wonder what would make her happy.
It must be some kind of meat.
Barbeque or sukiyaki or roast beef...
That is just what you would want to eat.
A spit roasted turkey would be nice too... it would fit the party.
I have never seen one in my life though...
Okumura, your menu is starting to sound a bit weird.
A flower bouquet would be nice, would not it?
Our garden has them too in the spring.
Shut the hell up, all of you!
Research it and have it ready by Sunday!
Do not buy one, bake one yourself!
I have never made sweets before though.
Konekomaru, you do the shopping and act as Okumura's advisor.
Moriyama and I will decorate the room.
You are not half bad at getting stuff done, Bon.
Bon, could I do something else...
It is okay, I know how much you love Japanese sweets!
But cakes and Japanese sweets are very different...
Let us do our best, Konekomaru!
Keep this a secret from everyone.
Can I have a word with you?
Come with me for a second.
Sorry to drag you out here so suddenly.
Great, you are so nice, Paku!
Your looks and your kindness are both top grade!
Okumura, read the recipe for me, please.
Four eggs, 200 grams of sugar, flour...
I will leave the rest to you!
And that is how it is done.
Suguro, you are so good at handicrafts!
It is none of your business!
Are you going out with him?
You were chatting during the lunch break like two little birdies.
He just asked me about the upcoming bir -
I was worried because he is such a flirt.
You will know once you see it.
It is so awkward to be alone with Okumura.
Umm, you sieve the flour and mix it well with the rest.
You really have not done this before?
Yeah, I just watched and learned.
But you too are so good at this, it is hard to believe that this is your first time.
You are really good at cooking!
There were only guys at our place and everyone sucked at cooking,
so I had no choice but to do it myself.
it is a lot more fun to cook for someone else, not just for yourself!
Let us make the best cake ever, Konekomaru!
The fluff is the life of the dough!
I got the message this morning that the herbs I ordered have arrived.
Umm, True Cross Academy, Faculty of Pharma...
Ah, this time it is my personal order.
It was your idea, was not it?
I am sure Kamiki will be happy.
I am doing it partially for my own sake.
Granny and Mom celebrate my birthday,
but this will be the first time I celebrate with my friends.
I have made friends since I started the cram school,
so I thought we could all celebrate together.
It is selfish, is not it?
By the way, when is your and Rin's birthday?
Have you ever had a birthday party?
It is so close to Christmas, we always celebrated the two together at the monastery.
But it never had this birthday feeling.
I hope the party will be a success.
It is just the first try though.
No way, no way, no way!
There is no way this will do!
You were supposed to keep an eye him!
I just... looked away for a moment...
It is perfect, is not it?
Looks like a perfectly fine birthday cake to me.
So birthday cakes and Christmas cakes are different?
You always learn new stuff, even at the age of 15...
What should we do with this?
This is just a small token of our gratitude.
Giving a cake celebrating the birth of God... to a demon?
Man, you sure do not need the uniform to be gorgeous.
Did I warn you for nothing, Paku?
You are such a weirdo, Shima!
I think it is pretty nice.
I think Izumo was collecting this series.
This is going way too fast!
Damn, I do not have an umbrella with me.
It is okay, I brought mine.
I have got something in my eye.
She found us out, my ass!
Did not you try to k...
Then what were you doing so close to each other?
We were looking for your birthday pre -
And that is how she found out.
I will not let you just use me like that!
You are just using me to have your little fun!
Izumo, you should be happy rather than...
Sorry, it was my idea to make a surprise party...
There is nothing to apologize for.
Moriyama wanted to make you happy.
Is celebrating your birthday such a nuisance?
I am just saying that it is unfair.
It is unfair to start celebrating birthdays now!
What about everyone who is had their birthday after we started school?
One of us has to be 16 already!
I remember you guys were talking about scooter licenses!
If you want to do this, then do it properly for everyone!
Otherwise I will not take part in it.
Then Bon and Shima and Kamiki...
Then I will give back the collected money to Suguro and Shima... Umm...
This is turning into a hassle.
Then let us throw a party for everyone, even for those who have their birthdays later!
Is it okay to write this in hiragana?
Just wait a moment, I will spell it for you.
We have been waiting for you!
Well, it is the only productive thing I am good at.
Then the presents we all have been waiting for!
We will decide who gets what by lottery!
I was just thinking about how much fun everyone is having.
You have been so weird lately, Yuki.
We have been told that our birthday is December 27th, but it does not really mean anything.
No one knows who gave birth to us when and where.
What kind of a person was our mom?
I picked you kids up under a bridge.
It was midwinter but this huuuge watermelon was floating in the river.
When I opened it, you guys were inside!
I did not really know which way I should cut the melon.
I could not do it right, so I accidentally cut you into two.
Father was always using stupid excuses and he never told us the truth.
I first met you two on a snowy day like this.
That is the only clue I have.
Now we have no way to figure out our true birthday.
No matter when you were born, I am happy you are here!
Hey, you two have numbers 2 and 7 left, take your picks!
I cannot let anyone get hurt because of me anymore!
You are not going anywhere today.
What is all the fuss about, Yukio?
Professor, you are still trying to...

It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
